verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> In the first לְדָרְיָ֛וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> of Darius בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחַשְׁוֵר֖וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> of Ahasuerus מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> of the seed מָדָ֑י <S%H4074><s%> of the Medes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הָמְלַ֔ךְ <S%H4427><s%> which was made king עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over מַלְכ֥וּת <S%H4438><s%> over the realm כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans

בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <S%H8141><s%> year אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> In the first לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I דָּֽנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> I Daniel בִּינֹ֖תִי <S%H995><s%> understood בַּסְּפָרִ֑ים <S%H5612><s%> by books מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> the number הַשָּׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> of the years אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> was דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> whereof the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמִיָ֣ה <S%H3414><s%> came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לְמַלֹּ֛אות <S%H4390><s%> that he would accomplish לְחָרְב֥וֹת <S%H2723><s%> in the desolations יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> And I set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> my face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> unto the Lord הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek תְּפִלָּ֖ה <S%H8605><s%> by prayer וְתַחֲנוּנִ֑ים <S%H8469><s%> and supplications בְּצ֖וֹם <S%H6685><s%> with fasting וְשַׂ֥ק <S%H8242><s%> and sackcloth וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H665><s%> and ashes

וָֽאֶתְפַּֽלְלָ֛ה <S%H6419><s%> And I prayed לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> my God וָאֶתְוַדֶּ֑ה <S%H3034><s%> and made my confession וָאֹֽמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> and said אָנָּ֤א <S%H577><s%> O אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> Lord הָאֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> God הַגָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> the great וְהַנּוֹרָ֔א <S%H3372><s%> and dreadful שֹׁמֵ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> keeping הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> the covenant וְֽהַחֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֖יו <S%H157><s%> to them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> him and to them that keep מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4687><s%> his commandments

חָטָ֥אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> We have sinned וְעָוִ֖ינוּ <S%H5753><s%> and have committed iniquity [וְהִרְשַׁעְנוּ כ] (הִרְשַׁ֣עְנוּ <S%H7561><s%> condemn ק) וּמָרָ֑דְנוּ <S%H4775><s%> and have rebelled וְס֥וֹר <S%H5493><s%> even by departing מִמִּצְוֹתֶ֖ךָ <S%H4687><s%> from thy precepts וּמִמִּשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4941><s%> and from thy judgments

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמַ֙עְנוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> Neither have we hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who דִּבְּרוּ֙ <S%H1696><s%> which spake בְּשִׁמְךָ֔ <S%H8034><s%> in thy name אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְלָכֵ֥ינוּ <S%H4428><s%> to our kings שָׂרֵ֖ינוּ <S%H8269><s%> our princes וַאֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> and our fathers וְאֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and to all the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

לְךָ֤ אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> O Lord הַצְּדָקָ֔ה <S%H6666><s%> righteousness וְלָ֛נוּ בֹּ֥שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> [belongeth] unto thee but unto us confusion הַפָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> of faces כַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as at this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> is this לְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the men יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּלְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and to the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <S%H3478><s%> and unto all Israel הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <S%H7138><s%> [that are] near וְהָרְחֹקִ֗ים <S%H7350><s%> and [that are] far off בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽאֲרָצוֹת֙ <S%H776><s%> through all the countries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to which הִדַּחְתָּ֣ם <S%H5080><s%> whither thou hast driven שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> because בְּמַעֲלָ֖ם <S%H4604><s%> them because of their trespass אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מָֽעֲלוּ־ <S%H4603><s%> that they have trespassed בָֽךְ׃

יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Lord לָ֚נוּ בֹּ֣שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> to us [belongeth] confusion הַפָּנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> of face לִמְלָכֵ֥ינוּ <S%H4428><s%> to our kings לְשָׂרֵ֖ינוּ <S%H8269><s%> to our princes וְלַאֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> and to our fathers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> because חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> because we have sinned לָֽךְ׃

לַֽאדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> To the Lord אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God הָרַחֲמִ֖ים <S%H7356><s%> [belong] mercies וְהַסְּלִח֑וֹת <S%H5547><s%> and forgivenesses כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מָרַ֖דְנוּ <S%H4775><s%> though we have rebelled בּֽוֹ׃

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁמַ֔עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> Neither have we obeyed בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לָלֶ֤כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk בְּתֽוֹרֹתָיו֙ <S%H8451><s%> in his laws אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> which he set לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> before בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> us by עֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophets

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yea all Israel עָֽבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> have transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּ֣וֹרָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H8451><s%> thy law וְס֕וֹר <S%H5493><s%> even by departing לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> not שְׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> that they might not obey בְּקֹלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice וַתִּתַּ֨ךְ <S%H5413><s%> is poured עָלֵ֜ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> so הָאָלָ֣ה <S%H423><s%> therefore the curse וְהַשְּׁבֻעָ֗ה <S%H7621><s%> upon us and the oath אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which כְּתוּבָה֙ <S%H3789><s%> that [is] written בְּתוֹרַת֙ <S%H8451><s%> in the law מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> because we have sinned לֽוֹ׃

וַיָּ֜קֶם <S%H6965><s%> And he hath confirmed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [דְּבָרָיו כ] (דְּבָרֹ֣ו <S%H1697><s%> act ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> which he spake עָלֵ֗ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against וְעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and against שֹֽׁפְטֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H8199><s%> against us and against our judges אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who שְׁפָט֔וּנוּ <S%H8199><s%> that judged לְהָבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> us by bringing עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and against רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> evil גְדֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> upon us a great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not נֶעֶשְׂתָ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> hath not been done תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> for under the whole heaven כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who נֶעֶשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> as hath been done בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> upon Jerusalem

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> it כָּתוּב֙ <S%H3789><s%> As [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> all this evil הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> is come עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not חִלִּ֜ינוּ <S%H2470><s%> upon us yet made we not our prayer אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for פְּנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> that we might turn מֵֽעֲוֹנֵ֔נוּ <S%H5771><s%> from our iniquities וּלְהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <S%H7919><s%> and understand בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> thy truth

וַיִּשְׁקֹ֤ד <S%H8245><s%> watched יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Therefore hath the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> respect הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> upon the evil וַיְבִיאֶ֖הָ <S%H935><s%> and brought עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> respect כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for צַדִּ֞יק <S%H6662><s%> [is] righteous יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> it upon us for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> respect כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all מַֽעֲשָׂיו֙ <S%H4639><s%> in all his works אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> which he doeth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> for we obeyed בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6963><s%> not his voice

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> and now אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> And now O Lord אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצֵ֨אתָ <S%H3318><s%> forth אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמְּךָ֜ <S%H5971><s%> thy people מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> with a mighty וַתַּֽעַשׂ־ <S%H6213><s%> and hast gotten לְךָ֥ שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> thee renown כַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as at this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> is this חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> we have sinned רָשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <S%H7561><s%> we have done wickedly

אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> O Lord כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צִדְקֹתֶ֙ךָ֙ <S%H6666><s%> according to all thy righteousness יָֽשָׁב־ <S%H7725><s%> be turned away נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now אַפְּךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> I beseech thee let thine anger וַחֲמָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H2534><s%> and thy fury מֵעִֽירְךָ֥ <S%H5892><s%> from thy city יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H6944><s%> thy holy כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because בַחֲטָאֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H2399><s%> because for our sins וּבַעֲוֹנ֣וֹת <S%H5771><s%> and for the iniquities אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers יְרוּשָׁלִַ֧ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem וְעַמְּךָ֛ <S%H5971><s%> and thy people לְחֶרְפָּ֖ה <S%H2781><s%> [are become] a reproach לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all סְבִיבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5439><s%> to all [that are] about

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> now שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> hear אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> Now therefore O our God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to תְּפִלַּ֤ת <S%H8605><s%> the prayer עַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to תַּ֣חֲנוּנָ֔יו <S%H8469><s%> and his supplications וְהָאֵ֣ר <S%H215><s%> to shine פָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> and cause thy face עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִקְדָּשְׁךָ֖ <S%H4720><s%> upon thy sanctuary הַשָּׁמֵ֑ם <S%H8076><s%> that is desolate לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> your sake אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> for the Lord's

הַטֵּ֨ה <S%H5186><s%> incline אֱלֹהַ֥י ׀ <S%H430><s%> O my God אָזְנְךָ֮ <S%H241><s%> thine ear וּֽשֲׁמָע֒ <S%H8085><s%> and hear [פִּקְחָה כ] (פְּקַ֣ח <S%H6491><s%> open ק) עֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes וּרְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> and behold שֹֽׁמְמֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H8077><s%> laid וְהָעִ֕יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> which is called שִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> by thy name עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> account כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> account צִדְקֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H6666><s%> thee for our righteousnesses אֲנַ֨חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we מַפִּילִ֤ים <S%H5307><s%> for we do not present תַּחֲנוּנֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H8469><s%> our supplications לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> on עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> account רַחֲמֶ֥יךָ <S%H7356><s%> mercies הָרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> but for thy great
